name: Helltender (JanaChumi, Lusque, Bruno Bandeira, Luciano Souza, Alana Ramos)
name_original: Helltender (JanaChumi, Lusque, Bruno Bandeira, Luciano Souza, Alana Ramos)
description:
Pay attention to the recipes, mix everything and make the most monstruouslicious drink to your clients. 

Control with mouse only.
